title: Talking about: Iain McGilchrist, Überboyo, JBP, Carl Jung's Aion - With Quality!
description:
These guys are on my mind...and how are they expanding my understanding of MOQ, life, and the user interface of Reality itself!

Uberboyo: https://youtu.be/pIjPRZ7ytro
Akira's Scott Adams album: https://youtu.be/NTcI1qxLTJ4
Aion: https://www.amazon.com/Aion-Researches-Phenomenology-Collected-Works/dp/069101826X/ref=sr_1_1?dchild=1&keywords=aion&qid=1614825060&sr=8-1
Aion on Scribd: https://www.scribd.com/read/233048659/Collected-Works-of-C-G-Jung-Volume-9-Part-2-Aion-Researches-into-the-Phenomenology-of-the-Self
